channel.title: Emotion Dynamics on Will Hipson
channel.description: Recent content in Emotion Dynamics on Will Hipson

item.title: Emotion Dynamics of Solitude
item.description: We often think of emotions as being there one moment and gone the next. However, we are always experiencing some sort of emotion - whether it’s boiling anger or vapid listlessness. The study of emotion dynamics is all about how emotions change over time. Emotions can change from one moment to the next - intensifying or deintensifying. I’m interested in exploring what predicts these complex changes. In particular, I’m interested in whether solitude impacts our emotional state.
